item.title: The Sustaining of Church Officers
item.description: President Henry B. Eyring presents names of General Authorities and other Church leaders for sustaining vote; he also announces the release of various leaders.

item.title: Worldwide Devotional, January 2016
item.description: On January 10, 2016 President Russell M. Nelson talks about becoming true millennials during the worldwide devotional.

item.title: Becoming True Millennials
item.description: On January 10, 2016 President Russell M. Nelson talks about becoming true millennials during the worldwide devotional.

item.title: Like A Watered Garden
item.description: September 13, 2015: Elder L. Whitney Clayton urges us to seek the abundant life Christ offers all who are rooted in Him.

item.title: A Regal Identity
item.description: September 13, 2015: Sister Kathy Kipp Clayton invites all to embrace and rejoice in who we really are.

item.title: Worldwide Devotional September 2015
item.description: September 13, 2015: Elder L. Whitney Clayton urges us to seek the abundant life Christ offers all who are rooted in Him.

item.title: Remembering The Life of Elder Robert D. Hales
item.description: Learn about the life and legacy of Robert D. Hales.

item.title: What the Scriptures Mean to Me
item.description: The scriptures can hold personal meaning for each individual. Elder Richard G. Scott explained that “they can become stalwart friends.”

item.title: Sacrifice
item.description: Our lives of service and sacrifice are the most appropriate expressions of our commitment to serve the Master and our fellowmen.

item.title: Show Me Counts More Than Tell Me
item.description: President Eyring recalls personal experiences where he witnessed young men being mentored in the Aaronic Priesthood.

item.title: Repentance: A Joyful Choice
item.description: Elder Dale G. Renlund tells a childhood story of lighting a firecracker in the chapel right before church began. He relates his story to the joy of repentance.
